kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: D:\Desafio\results\geckodriver-37.log

kw.name: Verificar se a página foi carregada
Title Should Be
kw.arg: KaBuM! | Maior E-commerce de Tecnologia e Games da América Latina
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'KaBuM! | Maior E-commerce de Tecnologia e Games da América Latina'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o produto "Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70"
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70' into text field 'id=input-busca'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Conferir se o produto Smartphone Samsung Galaxy A70 foi localizado
